title: Roll Wit The Clan
lyrics:
[Hook] {x4}
Roll with the clan and get that ass rolled over riggy roof
"Barking like a dog named Rover" - MC Breed 'Ain't No Future In Yo Future'

[Verse One]
I'm getting up early in the morning so I can ride out with my homies
And stop around the corner looking for hoochies that can bone me
And then I'm out
Float...float on
And you know I gotta keep my sounds cranked holmes
I'm 6'4" material, pulled out stereo, don't you wanna ride with me?
Greedy Greg in the back steady giggling
Till 5-0 pulled up then he stopped sniggling
I had no love and I showed no fear
The light turned green, peace...and I'm outta here
I'm headed to the liquor sto'
Gotta cop me a O.E. drink till the stores closed
Cause it's gonna be a long day
And the sun beaming down on my locs in my face
Homie Swift always keep his 380
Just in case a homie in the hood wanna act shady

[Hook]

[Verse Three]
Yo, I'm ready to hit the block non stop and get my mob on
As I float...float on
And my homie keeps call
Ready to hook up cause the block is shot from the bottom to the top
I guess there's nothing else to do, but um
Go and hit the club till 2:00
And uh
I guess I'd rather play it like that
Cause the hood that I'm front, I'm prepared to watch my own back
But in fact
Pop has to be in by 6:00
Just to keep the money coming in thick
I'm rolling in a Cherokee, girls can't see me they think that I'm Poppa Breed
But it's cool
Cause I creep sweet through the after set
Waiting for the first girl to break her neck
And I'm ready, ready for whatever
Peace to Breed and DFC lives forever
And I'm out


[Hook]

[Verse Three]
Yo we finally, made it to the hot spot
And all the girls all around cause they love to see my 6'4" drop
No drift, no scraping
16 switches for they girls and they babies

With they big ole' butts in them daiseys
And them big ole' stomachs looking crazy
Now I'm with mail, money grip and I'm home
Good looking out to my homie Tyrone
Mama ain't bought me a damn thang
But you don't see me throwing signs or slanging 'caine
So I'm straight I ain't got nothing to prove
I got mine, now it's your move
Or better just yet hold your butt and like plug it
Cause I'm a light skinned pimp and the girls be loving it
Now listen close to exactly who is speaking
I'm the C.A.P. to the O.N.E
I'm not down for the count I'm knocking them out by the dozen
And for your health, protect yourself for you love it

[Hook]

title: Things In Tha Hood
lyrics:
[HOOK: NATE DOGG]
Things in my hood ain't changed
Everyday it remains the same
Things in my hood ain't changed

Now?guess who's back with some laid?back tracks

We used to roll Trues and Vogues
Six by nines on the line of the back window
But now it's all about them Ds
And hundred spokes ain't no joke when you're hittin'
Three-wheel motion, now lay back when I'm coastin'
From city to city and ocean to ocean
I guess until I hit some land
With the trunk full of funk
And a drink in my hand, yeah

DFC comin' straight to a hood near you
Rollin' in a six-tre, girls can't see me
They know that I'm Alpha Breed

[HOOK: NATE DOGG]
Things in my hood ain't changed
Everyday it remains the same
Things in my hood ain't changed
Everyday it remains the same

And barbecue is the only aroma
Mister, mister I see you
Walkin' with a [???] or two
Every day and it goes on like this
Livin' in our neighborhood

Well it's a knock at the door
Man what up, yeah who is it

So I head downstairs to the dweller
I mean the cellar
Where the whoo like propeller
It's like really doe

Laid back in the cut with my locs up and my deuce-deuce
'Cause things in tha hood ain't changed
Runnin' around in a circle doin' the same old things


[HOOK: NATE DOGG]
Things in my hood ain't changed

Everyday it remains the same
(You either roll or get rolled over)

Everyday it remains the same

[RUBEN CRUZ]
Rollin' in the ride and we're out to play

Let's stop by the package store
Let me know if you really wanna roll
Really doe, hear me doe and let me go like you know and
Bust a crack in the window for the smoke

[HOOK: NATE DOGG]

title: F.A.N.G.
lyrics:
[VERSE 1: JAKE THE FLAKE]
I hustle 24-7, night and day
Makin' that fast cash
Money, mackin', murder
With two AKs and a ski mask
Hittin' licks on tricks
'Cuz they really don't deserve the shit
The niggas that I'm cliquin' with
Got you paranoid and nervous, bitch
Falsify, niggas die
Bouncin' to they homicide
Then witness they drivebys
Bunjee jump they suicide
Flint Thugs they multiply
The life we live is do or die
Double O Seven spies
Private as the GoldenEye
Focused on the dope game
Steady toastin' Champagne
Speedin' in the fast lane
All about my scrilla, mane
Hazardous to your health
I'm more deadlier than poison
Shootin' up yo' hood is all good
When I bring my boys in
Petty motherfuckers talkin'
Screamin' like they big shit
Run up on this clique
Get the pistol whip and hollow tip
What you know about hot lead
Leavin' these niggas left for dead
Gotta get my piece of the pie
And plus my whole loaf of bread
Organized like Y.B.I
Bitch niggas get petrified
Fuck with me, I bet you die
Watch how many necks get tied
Creepin' from the blind side
Lettin' niggas brains hang
Everyday life of a Flint All-Star Narcotic Gang

title: Underground Slang
lyrics:
[ VERSE 1: MC Breed ]
Big city lights, big city name
Where the only thing you know is the dope-dealing game
Makin that money just as fast as you can
And this pride is yours in bein a (dopeman)
Rollin big cars and carryin big knots
Niggas pushin Benzes with the drop-tops
Bitches all around, all over the place
Eyes open wide for a sap to chase
They just lookin for a fool to pay the rent
But bitch, you're dead wrong, you won't get a cent
Girlies out there, they don't know my name
MC Breed and that's me and that's one and the same
I went from pushin ki's of pure d caine
To writin def lyrics for the Underground Slang

(Money bustin out my socks) --] Kool G Rap

[ VERSE 2: MC Breed ]
The U-n-d-e-r-ground
Punk, don't make a sound
DFC comin through like: move!
Cause ain't shit for my posse to prove
Poppin caps don't matter, brain cells scatter
We head away on a 20 ft. ladder
Free as a bird, time to pass go
The posse break out, and T's drivin real slow
Lights start flashin all in my face
Red said "Fuck it," and began to race
Went 20 miles up, ridin through [Name]
T looked at me, said (peep the gas tank)
To hell with it, pull on the side of the road
"Get our of your jeep!" - man, you are cold
I yelled out the roof: "Fuck you hoes!"
We paid 20 grand for bullet-proof windows
2 ounces of dope in my fix-a-flat
2 rounds of ammo for my personal gat
Killed a 8 Ball, I'm ready to go
The sounds of flashing nine made my blood flow
( *shots* )Jumped on the roof and sprayed the beamlight
20 dead cops who ain't nothin nice
People don't know us, and they call us a gang
But we fo' raw niggas from the Underground Slang


The Underground Slang

Man...cold 40s, man
Lay back, uknowmsayin?
...some of these girlies out there, uknowmsayin?
The homie Red, uknomsayin
Cash T, Technology, me MC Breed
The whole DFC posse, uknowmsayin?
Standin for the 'Dope Force Connection'
Peace
